MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ST7 postcode area of Scholar Green, affecting properties in Margery Avenue and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.17am. Our engineers have arrived on site in the area and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.58am on 28th April 2021.
